actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the at risk rules applicable to the investment tax credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the at risk limitations of the investment tax credit any qualified leased property with respect to which a closely held corporation is the lessor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the at risk rules applicable to the investment tax credit.
